text: The San Marino Football Federation (; FSGC) is the governing body of football in San Marino. The association was founded in 1931. It organizes the football league Campionato Sammarinese and the San Marino national football team. It is headquartered in the city of San Marino. In 1988, they became a part of FIFA and UEFA. == Other websites == * Official website * San Marino at FIFA site * San Marino at UEFA site Category:1931 establishments in Europe Category:Sport in San Marino Category:Organizations based in San Marino Category:Association football governing bodies in Europe
title: San Marino Football Federation
